name: Hunter Raid: Idle RPG
description:
The raid started. Be alert to train hunters and wake them up!
Unknown red portal opened. Survive!

▶ Dungeon with the world universe
- The past, present, future, and fantasy universe are ready
▶ Changing job system
- Absorb the power of anonymous entity and be stronger
- Check out Berserker, Kensei and Sword Master
▶ Idle RPG features
- Enjoy fast growth with abundant in-app reward
▶ What's more?
- Guild System, costumes, and more!
